description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=2/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. FIELDS has all the ACTION of a SHOOTER crammed into a 3D PLATFORMER!!!  You have a special device which creates a “temporal field” that slows time around you. This ability allows you to evade bombing runs, dodge projectiles, escape twisters and lots more. Combined with some commando stunts and a nice gun you'll be fully equipped to tackle this amazing action-packed shooter!

Combined with some commando stunts and a nice gun you'll be fully equipped to tackle this amazing action-packed shooter!
